detail_desc: All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Shirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Seam just above the knee and a flared flounce to the hem. Long at the back and slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.

Block-coloured cardigan in a soft cotton knit with stripes knitted in various stitches to create a textured effect. Buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Stylish ballet pumps with a V-shaped opening and pointed toes. Imitation leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 1 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacquard-knit trousers with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Welt side pockets, a zipped, jetted back pocket and straight legs with contrasting colour piping down the sides and creases.
Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs.
Sleeveless lace halterneck top with narrow shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the back and fasten with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Jersey lining at the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft cotton with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood lined in waffled jersey. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.

Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a soft organic cotton weave with woven stripes and flounces with embroidered scalloped trims that start at the front and continue over the shoulders. Buttons at the back and a seam at the top with decorative gathers front and back. Lined.
Suit trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons at the front, a seam at the waist and a frill at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with two pairs of shorts and two T-shirts in printed cotton jersey. T-shirts with a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, an open chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless blouse in a softly draping weave with pin-tucks down the front. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a concealed zip at the back and belt with D-rings. Sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with cut-out sections on the shoulders and short, raglan sleeves.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening, concealed buttons and pin-tucks at the front. Double-layered flutter sleeves, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft jersey.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants in various designs. One long necklace and two shorter ones. Adjustable length 76-82.5 cm, 48-54 cm and 42-48.5 cm.
Cardigan in quilted jersey with a zip down the front, small stand-up collar with a press-stud, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather mules with adjustable straps with metal buckles. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.

Set with a pair of ballet pumps in imitation leather and a matching hairband in cotton jersey for the little ballerina. Shoes with an elastic strap over the foot, glossy bow at the front and small loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles. Hairband with a glossy bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and high cut at the back.
Low-rise chinos in stretch cotton twill with side and back pockets, a zip fly and button, low crotch and tapered legs that are close fitting at the calves.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a raw-edge hem.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Watch with a metal link bracelet and adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 2.2 cm. Width of links 1 cm, length of bracelet 22 cm.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in stretch satin made from a cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long dolman sleeves and a straight hem.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with visible seams, a wide neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, padded jacket in a patterned weave with a high collar, zip down the front and concealed zipped pockets at the front. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Diameter 2 cm.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with rhinestone-decorated text.

Dungaree dress, top, a pair of leggings and a hairband in soft cotton. Dress with front pockets, fixed straps with a knot detail, and press-studs at the back. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a fake fly. Front pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets and elasticated hems. Loose fit.

Long, round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with a wider neckline with raw roll edges. Open chest pocket, sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Suede mules with a large bow at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Satin linings and leather insoles. Small platform 3 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Leather ankle boots with a zip in one side, fabric linings, leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chest pocket with an interactive detail. Ribbing around the neckline.
Top in soft, airy modal jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and long sleeves.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Baseball jacket in woven fabric with a terry appliqué on the chest, zip down the front with a chin guard and fake front pockets. Stand-up collar with striped ribbing, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a collar, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Set with a shirt, cardigan and bow tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Fine-knit jumper in a viscose blend with a soft brushed finish and a round neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with press-studs, and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in size 4-12M.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points, a lined hood with a peak and elastic drawstring, and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a chest pocket, zipped lift pass pocket and two inner pockets, one with a zip and the other in mesh. Snow flap with reinforced elastication and press-studs at the waist, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.
Hats in soft jersey.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
